Mar 12, 21:59 EST

Scheduled - The Hypixel Forums will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time to upgrade the backend storage system.

item.title: Public API Response Times
item.description:
Mar 9, 17:49 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 9, 16:21 EST
Monitoring - We have re-enabled these endpoints after making some improvements. We'll be looking at deploying new hardware for further improvements in the coming days.

Mar 9, 13:01 EST
Identified - We have temporarily disabled SkyBlock profile endpoints while we work on scaling the hardware for the Public API due to increased demand

Mar 9, 11:46 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating issues with the Public API having increased response times than usual.

item.title: Forums Degraded Performance
item.description:
Mar 5, 06:23 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 5, 04:42 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified. The Hypixel Forums will be unavailable until this issue is resolved. You may submit bug reports and appeals at a later time. Thank you for your patience!

Mar 4, 23:04 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue. You will be unable to create threads or submit replies to threads in some sub-forums, such as the Server Bug Reports and Punishment Appeals forums.

item.title: Forums Maintenance
item.description:
Mar 2, 11:24 EST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Please note that due to unexpected complications with our new external storage system, we will be running another maintenance in the coming days.

Mar 1, 13:01 EST
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still underway. We are currently finalizing the file transfer while upgrading the backend server hardware and forum software.

Mar 1, 04:57 EST
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress as we move existing data to the new system. Please note that this Forums maintenance will last longer than originally expected. Thank you for your patience!

Feb 28, 19:00 EST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 26, 15:57 EST
Scheduled - The Hypixel Forums will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time to upgrade the backend storage system.

Please note that the maintenance may last significantly longer than specified. Both the Hypixel Support and Hypixel Store websites will be unaffected and available as usual.

item.title: Support Webpage Inaccessible
item.description:
Feb 8, 20:54 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 8, 09:48 EST
Update - We are aware of an issue with the https://support.hypixel.net webpage being inaccessible, this is an issue with an upstream provider. Users can still contact support via the support@hypixel.net email.

Feb 8, 09:00 EST
Identified - We are aware of an issue with the https://support.hypixel.net webpage being inaccessible.

item.title: Network Issues
item.description:
Dec 17, 06:37 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 17, 06:15 EST
Monitoring - SkyBlock is no longer in maintenance, API endpoints are re-enabled. We are still monitoring to make sure there are no further issues.

Dec 17, 05:04 EST
Identified - The API is back but SkyBlock profile endpoints are currently disabled. SkyBlock is still also in maintenance.

Dec 17, 04:42 EST
Investigating - We're aware of some network issues and we are investigating. SkyBlock is currently in maintenance due to this.

item.title: Support Unavailable
item.description:
Dec 13, 21:13 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 13, 16:03 EST
Identified - The support upstream provider is working to resolve this issue and are expecting to be operational again within 4 hours.

Dec 13, 12:47 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Support Response Delays
item.description:
Dec 8, 11:21 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 8, 07:26 EST
Investigating - We're currently experiencing a technical issue with our support site, please allow extra time for a response. Tickets can still be submitted through https://support.hypixel.net

item.title: Unable to Create Support Tickets
item.description:
Oct 13, 17:16 EDT
Resolved - The issue with creating tickets has now been resolved.

Oct 12, 09:00 EDT
Identified - We are aware of an issue where users are unable to submit support tickets. We are in contact with the upstream provider to resolve this as soon as possible.

In the meantime, users can email support@hypixel.net directly.
